title: Is there a SCP-1000? If so, what does he do? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes. He is a nocturnal omnivorous ape. He evolved along homo sapiens.They have grey, brown, black, red and sometimes white fur. 10000-15000 years ago, an extinction event killed 95%-99% of their population. They have large eyes with good vision.The effect of SCP-1000 is any hominid that directly or indirectly observes SCP 1000 has a 2% chance of being killed through anomalous means via permanent cessation of brain function.
